code: @Test public void testSpring() throws Exception {     context.addRoutes(new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("file:target/data/file/custom?scheduler=spring").routeId("foo").noAutoStartup().to("mock:result").         }     }).     try {         context.start().         fail("Should throw exception").     } catch (Exception e) {         ClassNotFoundException cnfe = assertIsInstanceOf(ClassNotFoundException.class, e.getCause().getCause().getCause()).         assertEquals("org.apache.camel.spring.pollingconsumer.SpringScheduledPollConsumerScheduler", cnfe.getMessage()).     } }
